reviews.text:
To me this is the best coffee place in Blitar so far. Coffee quality, variety is very good. Food options are plenty and tasty. Ample parking space.
Too bad they don't have pastry options.

We went to this cafe for our anniversary. We love the ambience of this place. It was warm and cozy. The food was amazing. We ordered salmon mashed and spaghetti meatball also ice and hot chocolate for the drink. For the dessert, we tried tiramisu cake and it was not as good as we expected to be, the cake was just so-so.

My personal experience when I came to NATA was fantastic, the place is so comfortable and aesthetic. Based on my mind, the menu served some extraordinary dishes. The food is nice, the beverage is so refreshing, and you should try for every various items here. I strongly believe that NATA will be the one of the amazing cafe in Blitar Town. LOVELY! ðŸ˜˜

Very new. Great ambiance. Large parking slots for motorbike. Slot for car parking provides more than enough capacity. Coffee taste good, but could be improved. Prices for coffee are sooo cheap compared to those in my second city in where I live, haha.

It was great to spend our wedding anniv in here.. nice and cozy place..
The food(s) was so delicious (overall).
I ordered Chicken Parmigiana and thought it would be served with spaghetti, but i got fries & salads. It's still good though, i enjoyed it.. maybe i suggest you to pay attention with the chicken's coating, especially at the corner side is lil' bit thick so its result is too crunchy for me..
My fav dishes here are Chicken Parmigiana & the cheesecake. So so recommended to be repurchased ! Thx for the great service, too. We enjoyed the dinner so much.
And for everyone who bring a baby, this restaurant has provided baby chair for your baby..
